scripts.build: npm run minify-css && npm run optimize-images
scripts.optimize-images: sharp -q 100 -c 9 -i ./images/*.jpg -o ./images/300 resize 300 --withoutEnlargement true -f webp && sharp -q 100 -c 9 -i ./images/*.jpg -o ./images/600 resize 600 --withoutEnlargement true -f webp && sharp -q 100 -c 9 -i ./images/*.jpg -o ./images/900 resize 900 --withoutEnlargement true -f webp
